title: Can i do chapter 7 with traffic tickets from a collections agency. and also can i do my car payment and keep my car?
question: traffic tickets , car loans
answers:
Generally, debts owed to municipalities and governmental entities are non-dischargeable. This includes traffic tickets, even if a collections agency is trying to collect them.

You can keep your car, but you will have to agree to be responsible for the balance of the car loan. This is called reaffirming the car loan.
